# Features Log

This file tracks nodes and features added by the automated OpenCode agent.

## Format

Each entry should follow this format:
```
## YYYY-MM-DD - Feature/Node Name
- Model ID: `provider/model-name`
- Category: `image`, `video`, or `audio`
- Description: Brief summary of what was added
```

---

## 2026-01-15 - ElevenLabs Audio Nodes

Added three new ElevenLabs audio generation nodes:

- **ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech Multilingual V2**: `elevenlabs/text-to-speech-multilingual-v2`
  - Category: `audio`
  - Description: High-quality multilingual TTS with voice controls, stability, and style customization.

- **ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech Turbo 2.5**: `elevenlabs/text-to-speech-turbo-2-5`
  - Category: `audio`
  - Description: Fast text-to-speech model optimized for low latency with same voice controls.

- **ElevenLabs Sound Effect V2**: `elevenlabs/sound-effect-v2`
  - Category: `audio`
  - Description: AI-generated sound effects for games, videos, and applications from text descriptions.

## Initial Setup - 2026-01-15

Repository configured with OpenCode memory and automated Kie.ai sync workflow.
